section.heading: Hours of Operation.
section.text: A facility operator shall submit its proposed hours of operation to the Commission for written approval.

section.heading: Facility Design Standards.
section.text: A facility operator shall, at its own expense, construct its facility in accordance with specifications established by the Commission, including:

para.text: Computer space for the instant bingo validation and accounting server that is:
Equipped with heating, ventilation, and air conditioning;
Supplied with power including an uninterruptible back-up power supply;
Secured with a key or alternative locking mechanism; and
Covered by a surveillance system enabled to record all entry and exit to the computer space and activity in the area;
A surveillance system approved in writing by the Commission that is:
Configured to provide surveillance of all instant bingo machines and related activities within the facility in accordance with standards established by the Commission; and
Enabled with a digital video recording format in accordance with standards established by the Commission;
An alarm system connected to all emergency exits from the gaming floor that produces a distinguishable warning sound discernible in the vicinity of an exit when the emergency door is opened;
Any signage required by the Commission;
Communication systems capable of effecting timely communication between the facility, law enforcement exercising proper jurisdiction over the facility, emergency first responders; and
Any other equipment or design feature required by the Commission.
A facility operator shall submit a floor plan depicting its gaming floor and all restricted areas to the Commission for review and written approval.
A facility operator may not commence operations until its gaming floor plan is approved in writing by the Commission.
A gaming floor plan that a facility operator submits to the Commission shall depict:
The gaming floor with a notation as to:
Total square feet;
Total square feet utilized for the placement of instant bingo machines;
The location of each instant bingo machine;
All restricted areas within the facility with a notation as to:
Locations for redemption of instant bingo tickets;
Location for the counting of currency from instant bingo machines;
Locations for the storage of currency;
Computer space allocated to the instant bingo validation and accounting system;
An area designated for the storage or repair of instant bingo machines;
Surveillance monitoring room; and
Locations for the storage of instant bingo tickets.
Each surveillance camera; and
Each automated teller machine.
A facility operator may not implement any change to its approved gaming floor plan without the prior written approval of the Commission.
